text: Hi. I'm MJ. Have you heard of Save the Children?
I believe I have, yes.

It's a charity that directly benefits kids in terms of education, food, etc., especially in war-torn countries. I was hoping I could interest you in donating a portion of your payment today toward it.
I could donate $1.
That would be really generous.  I plan to donate $1 too.
Great. What are some recent successes the charity has had?
You know. I'd have to look that up to get specifics, but give me a sec and I'll go look. Where are you from?
I'm in Chicago
Ah, the windy city. I'm in Midvale, Utah.
Pretty cool. I've never been to Utah.
We've got some beautiful national parks here. Lots of crazy rock formations.
Yeah I've seen pictures of them. A lot of my friends have done the whole touring the parks out west trip; I just haven't yet.
I hope you do some day. Right now, Save the Children is working with Rohingya Refugees and Hurricane Harvey victims among other things (didn't want you to think I forgot your question)
No that's cool. It's good to hear about things being done about the Rohingya situation.
We only have a couple of seconds left. I just wanted to say that it was nice to chat with you.
Nice chatting with you too!
Ready for fall in  Chicago? What's the weather like there?
It's been humid but we've got a huge thunderstorm going right now. Hopefully it will break the heat.
Would love a good thunderstorm. Very dry here.  Take care, my friend.
You take care too!
